== Pathiriyad (CT) (627275) ==

Pathiriyad (CT) is a town in the [[Thalassery]] taluka of [[Kannur]] district with an area of 13.01 sq. km. and harbouring 3914 households with total population of 18008 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kannur]] is at a distance of 21 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 504 km. Male population is 8353 and female population is 9655. Scheduled Caste population is 345 and Scheduled Tribes population is 59. Census Location Code of the town is 627275<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kanhangad  (m + og) at a distance of 79 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 79 km. Railway station is at Thalassery at a distance of 12 km.
